metadata.title: CVE-2015-1306 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The newsletter posting area in the web interface in Sympa 6.0.x before6.0.10 and 6.1.x before 6.1.24 allows remote attackers to read arbitraryfiles via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1306` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sympa - 6.1.23~dfsg-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: sympa package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.1.23~dfsg-2').
